archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.2e: e) exploiting information, typically performing enhanced due diligence measures, identifying fake or counterfeit documents, monitoring online activity for details about stolen material and liaising with law enforcement bodies.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
